title: Part-Time Influencer Marketing Officer
job_overview:
[About the Role]
We are currently recruiting multiple part-time social media influencer marketing specialists. Applicants should be result-oriented. Among all the qualities we look for in our recruitment, integrity, responsibility and proactiveness are the most valued.

Please note that you need to prepare your own tools for searching and contacting influencers for this position.

Your main responsibilities include: discovering and recruiting influencer resources, maintaining cooperative relationships with influencers, and promoting products and enhancing brand awareness through their influence.

Outstanding performers will have the opportunity to participate in other business projects, such as social media operation, creative projects, integrated marketing communication projects, etc.
